verbose_text: Morpholino (MO) knockdown of vdra strongly reduced runx1 expression in the aorta-gonad-meso-nephros (AGM) region 36 hr post fertilization (hpf) by whole-mount in situ hybridization (WISH) (XREF_FIG) without overt defects in the vascular niche, as marked by flk1 (XREF_FIG) and ephrinb2 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
